text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I had a perfect break~.
Wow, it's been a while since I've been in the trainer's room~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to that, I had a fun break, eating meals with friends,
and going to the public bath with the grandmas from the shopping district.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty, from here on out, it's back to days of hard work.
I'll get my spirits up again~.
